Master Basic Computer Skills in 8 Weeks & Earn ₦400,000 Monthly

Yes, you read that right! You don’t need to be tech-savvy or have prior experience to master the essential computer skills needed in today’s digital world.

If you want to get a better job, start a business, or work remotely, this training will equip you with the foundational skills to thrive in the modern workspace.

If you think computers are complicated or feel lost whenever you use one, don’t worry—we break everything down step by step. If you’re patient and ready to learn, this training will transform your digital skills within just 30 to 60 days!

Get Started

Here's Why You NEED
to Act NOW!

Today, basic computer skills are no longer optional—they’re a necessity!

Employers, businesses, and even daily activities require some level of computer proficiency. If you don’t upgrade your skills, you risk being left behind in the digital age.

What This Training Will Do for You:

  • Make You More Employable & Land better jobs with computer literacy skills.
  • Help You Start a Side Hustle & Work remotely, freelance, or start an online business.
  • Boost Your Productivity & Learn how to navigate technology faster and more efficiently.
  • Prepare You for High-Income Digital Careers & Gain foundational skills for tech-related jobs.
Enroll Now

Where You Can Make Money After Training:

Why This Course is Worth ₦500,000

Microsoft Office Mastery

Become skilled in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Outlook for business and personal use.

Typing & Productivity Techniques

Increase your speed and efficiency with expert keyboarding skills.

Internet & Email Essentials

Learn how to browse safely, manage emails professionally, and use online platforms effectively.

File Management & Data Organization

Understand how to store, organize, and retrieve files efficiently.

Basic Troubleshooting & Security

Learn how to fix common computer issues, avoid scams, and stay safe online.

Remote Work Tools

Get familiar with Zoom, Google Workspace, Slack, and other remote work tools.

Social Media & Online Communication

Navigate platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and WhatsApp Business for networking and marketing.

How to Monetize Your Computer Skills

Learn how to start earning ₦400,000 monthly with digital skills.

Enroll Now

who is this For?

1

Job Seekers Who Want to Stand Out

Many jobs today require basic computer proficiency. This training will help you gain confidence and get hired faster.

2

Business Owners Who Want to Go Digital

Learn how to manage your business online, use digital tools, and stay ahead of the competition.

3

Students & Fresh Graduates Who Want to Be Ready for the Workplace

Schools don’t teach practical digital skills—this course will prepare you for real-world jobs.

4

Professionals Who Feels Left Behind by Technology

If computers intimidate you, this beginner-friendly course will help you become confident and tech-savvy.

Enroll Now

The Price? Practically a Giveaway

We’ve priced this course at ₦500,000 because that’s what it’s truly worth, but here’s the deal:

  • If you enroll TODAY, you’ll pay just ₦200,000!
  • Pay within 12 hours, and we’ll further slash it to ₦150,000 ONLY!

That’s a ₦350,000 discount—a small investment for the skills that can set you up for a lifetime of success. 

Offer Ends in

Days

Enroll Now

we’re here to Answer all your questions

Do I need any prior computer knowledge?

No! This course is beginner-friendly and designed for people with little to no computer experience. We start from the basics and guide you step by step.

Do I need a laptop for this training?

Yes. Since this is a practical, hands-on course, you will need access to a laptop or desktop computer to practice and complete exercises. If you don’t have one, we can guide you on affordable rental or purchase options.

How long will it take before I master basic computer skills?

This is an 8-week structured program, and by the end of the training, you’ll be fully comfortable using a computer, handling digital tasks, and working online. However, your progress depends on how much you practice.

Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! You will receive a recognized digital certificate that proves your proficiency in basic computer skills, which can help you secure jobs and freelancing opportunities.

How can I make money with my computer skills?

There are multiple ways to earn, including:

  • Freelancing (data entry, virtual assistance, document formatting).
  • Online tutoring (teaching basic computer skills to others).
  • Managing social media and emails for businesses.
  • Offering document creation services (CVs, presentations, reports).
  • Working remotely in entry-level tech jobs.

don't Miss Out
